Measurements¶

class measurements.Identity(ndata, npix)¶
class measurements.Measurement(ndata, npix)¶

Measurement operators operate on some map X to create observations Y Adjoints operate on measurements to return some map X is a vector of size npix (number of pixels on the sphere) Y is a vector of size ndata (number of data points)

class measurements.PathIntegral(path_matrix)¶
